name: Adil Sangeen
story: Abdul-Aziz Zakhilwal was born in a small village in the middle east. He joined the army at a young age to provide for his family. After several years of service, he was promoted to the rank of Corporal and selected to be a Recon Pathfinder due to his exceptional tracking and navigation skills. Abdul-Aziz is known for being calm and calculative in high-pressure situations, and is respected by his fellow soldiers for his dedication and loyalty to the cause. He is married and has two children, whom he hopes to provide a better life for through his service in the army.
